data.title: Dentist in Beaver Dam & Horicon — Preferred Dental Partners
data.meta_description: Discover a unique experience & exceptional dental care at Preferred Dental Partners. Explore the difference from our Beaver Dam dental and Horicon team today!
data.text:
Dentist in Beaver Dam & Horicon

Serving Communities with Dedication for Over 40 Years

Beaver Dam: 920.345.3942

Welcome to Preferred Dental Partners

Where smiles are crafted and families are cared for with compassionate care and expertise. At our practice, we understand that oral health is a journey, and we're here to guide you and your family every step of the way. With a team of dedicated doctors dedicated to various fields of dentistry, from general oral health for your family to specialized treatments like oral surgery and TMJ therapy, we offer comprehensive care to all of our patients.

Dr. John Borja

DDS

Dr. Anna Minnema

DDS

Dr. Megan Oldridge

DMD

Our Core Values

The WOW! Experience

From the moment our patients step into our door, to the time they leave, we want them to experience something they’ve never experienced at a dental office before.

Always Be Growing

We are better today than yesterday. We will continue to educate ourselves and improve our practice so that our patients can always be confident they are receiving the best care.

Compassionate Care

There are humans attached to the mouths we treat. We will always remember our patients’ and our teammates’ humanity. Our dental care will be given with compassion and kindness.

We are ONE

Our team is one. No teammate is more or less important than any other teammate. We will have each other’s backs always. We will work together to provide excellent patient care.

Strive for Balance

At the end of the day, we know family is the most important. We love our clinic, our team, and our work, however, we realize that there are many things that are more important and should be valued as such.

Comprehensive Dental Care Under One Roof

At Preferred Dental Partners, we believe in offering a full spectrum of dental services under one roof. Our range of services includes:

General Dentistry: We prioritize your oral health with routine check-ups, teeth cleanings, and preventive care. Our general dentistry services are designed to maintain your oral health and detect any issues early.

Restorative Dentistry: Our team is skilled in restoring the functionality and aesthetics of your teeth. From fillings and crowns to bridges and dentures, we use the latest techniques and materials to restore your smile.

Cosmetic Dentistry: Transform your smile with our cosmetic dentistry services. We offer teeth whitening, veneers, bonding, and more to enhance the appearance of your teeth.

Comprehensive Dental Care: Our practice also provides root canal treatments, periodontal therapy, and oral surgery, ensuring that all your dental needs are met in one convenient location.

What People Are Saying

"Preferred Dental Partners have provided our family with dental care for a number of years. From implants to orthodontia to our basic care they have been professional, friendly and accommodating for all our dental needs. Don't hesitate to consider them for your needs if you are in search of dental care."

— Mark Case, Google Review

“Such a great environment the staff is really listens to what you have to say and your concerns. I got my first tooth pulled there and I could not have been more comfortable. I went in there nervous and once I started talking to the dentist I was put at ease and it all went really well.”

— Nicole Mays, Google Review

“I’ve been afraid of the dentist since I was a kid. I'm talking anxiety attack, crying in the chair, looking for the exit afraid. My recent experience at PDP in Horicon, however, has completely changed how I feel about going to the dentist.”

— Nicole Budde, Google Review

“Excellent dentistry. Everyone in the office is friendly and knows how to treat you as a person. I love Dr. Minnema and the rest of her staff! Very knowledgeable and friendly. Shares everything she is doing and going to do in the future.”

— MaryAnn Firehammer, Google Review

Accreditations and Memberships
